name: Create Views on top Parquet Files

content.query:
-- Views for Dimensions
-- Source Synstem Data

CREATE VIEW LDW.Trips
AS
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsedatalake55.dfs.core.windows.net/synpasecontainer/NYCTripSmall.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS dimension 


select * from LDW.Trips
